fields_of_interest: Trade, Competition, Consumers, Culture, Customs, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Business and Industry, Environment, Taxation, Single market, Research and innovation
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
commission_expert_groups_and_other_simil: Expert Group on the exchange of information on Best Available Techniques related to industrial emissions (IED Article 13 Forum)#E02611#http://ec.europa.eu/transparency/regexpert/index.cfm?do=groupDetail.groupDetail&groupID=2611#Member#C#Expert Group on Forest-based Industries and Sectorally Related Issues#E01356#http://ec.europa.eu/transparency/regexpert/index.cfm?do=groupDetail.groupDetail&groupID=1356#Member#C
membership:
The Furniture National Federations, Full Members of EFIC, are: 
 
Austria: Austrian Furniture Industry  
Belgium: FEDUSTRIA, Fédération belge de l'industrie textile et l'industrie du bois et de l'ameublement  
Bulgaria: BCWFI, Bulgarian Branch Chamber of Woodworking and Furniture Industry 
Denmark: TMI, Træ- og Møbelindustrien  
France: UNIFA - Union Nationale des Industries Françaises de l’Ameublement 
Germany: VDM, Verband der Deutschen Möbelindustrie  
Hungary: Hungarian Association Magyar Bútor – és Faipari Szövetség  
Italy: FLA, Federlegnoarredo  
Netherlands: CBM, Branchevereniging voor interieurbouw en meubelindustrie  
Norway: Norsk Industri møbel + interiør  
Portugal: AIMMP, Associação das Indústrias de Madeira e Mobiliário de Portugal  
Sweden: TMF, Trä- och Möbelföretagen  
Turkey: MOSDER, Association of Turkish Furniture Manufacturers 
 
The Single Companies, Associated Members of EFIC, are: 
Ikea of Sweden
relevant_communication:
EFIC priority areas are: 
 
•Information to consumers 
•Harmonization of EU Internal Market 
•Health and safety 
•Environmental Sustainability 
•IPRs protection 
•Innovation and product development 
•Education and Training 
•Free and fair trade 
•Sectorial Social Dialogue
goals__remit: Monitoring EU legislation affecting the furniture sector and informing EFIC members; Building common goals and positions; Representing the EU furniture manufacturers within the European Institutions; Working on common projects of interest for the sector.
